title: Brain Challenge™
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, Local Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Ready to start down the road to excellent mental fitness? Upgrade to the full version of Brain Challenge™ to unlock twenty different mini-games in five brain-building categories. Daily exercises challenge you to increase your mental capacity: they never repeat, and the better you do, the harder they get!  Challenge your brain, monitor your progress, and watch your mental capacity grow! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Brain Challenge™
childDownloads.description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, Local Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Need a brain boost? Check out the ultimate daily brain training partner! The trial version of Brain Challenge™ helps you evaluate your mental skills with five fun, adaptive mini-games. Each challenging question is a perfect example of the entertaining brain exercise you’ll get while improving your Memory, Visual, Logic, Math, and Focus abilities. Download it now and start building your brain power! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage.
